channel.title: 667-704 help teleport command
channel.description: hi guys iv being trying to find a teleport command that works with matrix source for a while now if anyone can post me a snippit id be very thankful

item.title: 667-704 help teleport command
item.dc:creator: @ipwnu2day ipwnu2day
item.description:
@ipwnu2day wrote:

First find this in Commands.java

Under that add this:

Now add this under any command:

if (cmd[0].equalsIgnoreCase("mine")) { Magic.sendNormalTeleportSpell(player, 0, 0, new WorldTile(X Coordinate, Y Coordinate, 0)); player.getPackets().sendGameMessage( "You have teleported to ENTER PLACE HERE.");

  • Replace the X Coordinate, Y Coordinate, and the ENTER PLACE HERE with your information!

Read full topic
